spatial_accuracy.notes: The 3D render significantly distorts the layout. The complex L-shaped geometry of the original floor plan has been simplified into a basic rectangle. The entire service wing (Foyer, Servant Room, Kitchen, Utility) is absent or structurally unrecognizeable. Room adjacencies and wall alignments do not match the source.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the roof is removed and there is no text/UI, multiple rooms are missing (E1). The model hallucinations include an enclosed rectangular perimeter that ignores the balcony cut-outs and the staggered room depths shown in the floor plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Minimal furniture present. Bed placement is inconsistent with the plan's layout; most living room seating, dining tables, and kitchen counters are entirely missing.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render successfully adheres to the low-poly, flat-shaded style on a neutral background. The isometric camera angle is correct.

detected_errors.description: Missing entire Service/Kitchen/Utility wing and Balconies.
Major layout distortion; staggered footprint simplified into a single rectangular block.
Structural reinterpretation of room shapes and wall connections.
Missing 90% of specified furniture including dining set, sofas, and kitchen fixtures.
